entries.name: new(filename = DefaultFileName)
entries.desc: Creates a new Resolv::Hosts, using filename for its data source.

entries.name: each_address(name, &proc)
entries.desc: Iterates over all IP addresses for name retrieved from the hosts file.

entries.name: each_name(address, &proc)
entries.desc: Iterates over all hostnames for address retrieved from the hosts file.

entries.name: getaddress(name)
entries.desc: Gets the IP address of name from the hosts file.

entries.name: getaddresses(name)
entries.desc: Gets all IP addresses for name from the hosts file.

entries.name: getname(address)
entries.desc: Gets the hostname of address from the hosts file.

entries.name: getnames(address)
entries.desc: Gets all hostnames for address from the hosts file.
